media.headline: Barrett sings national anthem
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Barrett performs national anthem at PNC Park
media.bigblurb: Country singer Gabby Barrett sings the national anthem at PNC Park prior to the Pirates home opener vs. the Braves

media.headline: McCutchen's first hit at home
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: McCutchen singles in first AB in home opener
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen smacks a single to left field to collect his first hit of the season in the Pirates' home opener

media.headline: Bashioum siblings' first pitch
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Bashioum siblings toss out first pitch
media.bigblurb: The children of late police officer Scott Bashioum throw out the first pitch at PNC Park prior to the Pirates home opener vs. the Braves

media.headline: McCutchen's RBI single
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: McCutchen lines an RBI single to left field
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen drills a single to left field to score Starling Marte and gets an ovation from the crowd for his first RBI of the season

media.headline: Nova escapes bases-loaded jam
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Nova induces double play to get out of a jam
media.bigblurb: With bases loaded in the top of the 4th inning, Ivan Nova forces Brandon Phillips to ground into a 6-3 double play to end the frame

media.headline: Braves' lineup gets introduced
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Braves lineup gets introduced at PNC Park
media.bigblurb: The Braves' lineup get introduced at PNC Park prior to the team's showdown with the Pirates

media.headline: Pirates' lineup introduced
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Bucs' lineup introduced before home opener
media.bigblurb: The Pirates' lineup gets introduced prior to the club's home opener at PNC Park vs. the Braves

media.headline: Marte's RBI single
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Marte knocks home Mercer with single to left
media.bigblurb: Starling Marte hits a hard grounder to left field that drives in Jordy Mercer, giving the Pirates a 2-0 lead in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Inciarte's RBI double
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Inciarte drives an RBI double off the wall
media.bigblurb: Ender Inciarte smokes a double off the right-field wall to score Emilio Bonifacio and get the Braves on the board in the top of the 5th

media.headline: Freese's solo homer
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Freese crushes a solo home run to center
media.bigblurb: David Freese launches a solo home run over the wall in center field, extending the Pirates' lead to 3-1 in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Cervelli's solo homer
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Cervelli hits solo homer to go back-to-back
media.bigblurb: Francisco Cervelli crushes a solo home run to deep left field to go back-to-back with David Freese, giving the Pirates a 4-1 lead in the 5th

media.headline: Barrett on her Pittsburgh roots
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Barrett talks about her Pittsburgh roots
media.bigblurb: Singer-songwriter Gabby Barrett talks about growing up as a Pirates fan in the Pittsburgh area and her experience at the home opener

media.headline: Bucs belt back-to-back homers
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Freese, Cervelli go back-to-back in the 5th
media.bigblurb: David Freese and Francisco Cervelli crank back-to-back home runs in the 5th inning to extend the Pirates' lead over the Braves

media.headline: Kemp's diving grab
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Kemp makes a great diving catch in left
media.bigblurb: Matt Kemp makes a great diving catch on a fly ball in left field off the bat of Josh Harrison in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Marte's second RBI single
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Marte plates Cervelli with hard-hit single
media.bigblurb: Starling Marte hits a line-drive single to left field to score Francisco Cervelli, giving the Pirates a 5-1 lead in the 7th

media.headline: Freese drilled by hard grounder
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Freese hit in the chest by hard grounder
media.bigblurb: David Freese gets drilled in the chest by a hard grounder from Dansby Swanson, but remains in the game

media.headline: Markakis' RBI double
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Markakis connects for RBI double to center
media.bigblurb: Nick Markakis drives a double to right-center field over the head of Andrew McCutchen to score Freddie Freeman in the 8th

media.headline: Phillips' two-run single
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Phillips drives in a pair with a single
media.bigblurb: Brandon Phillips strokes a line-drive single to center field to score Chase d'Arnaud and Nick Markakis, cutting the Braves' deficit to 1

media.headline: Pirates turn sweet double play
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Harrison, Mercer combine to turn terrific DP
media.bigblurb: Josh Harrison makes a great diving stop behind second, then flips to Jordy Mercer who spins and fires to first to turn a double play

media.headline: Nova fans four in home opener
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Nova fires six strong innings in home opener
media.bigblurb: Ivan Nova tosses six strong innings with four strikeouts against the Braves in the Pirates' home opener

media.headline: Kemp exits game after single
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Kemp singles, leaves game with injury
media.bigblurb: Matt Kemp hits a sharp grounder to left field for a single, but walks gingerly to first and leaves the game with an injury

media.headline: McCutchen's great sliding catch
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: McCutchen makes an awesome sliding catch
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen sprints in from right field to make a great sliding grab on a sinking liner, robbing Dansby Swanson of a hit

media.headline: Phillips' basket catch
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Phillips battles wind to make a basket catch
media.bigblurb: Josh Harrison pops up towards first, but with the wind swirling the ball directs to Brandon Phillips who makes a nice basket catch

media.headline: Cervelli loses bat evading pitch
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Cervelli falls back to evade pitch
media.bigblurb: Francisco Cervelli falls back emphatically to evade a high fastball from Mike Foltynewicz and loses his bat in the process

media.headline: McCutchen stellar in home opener
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: McCutchen shines at the plate and field
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen tallies three hits and makes an outstanding diving grab in the Pirates' 5-4 win over the Braves in the 2017 home opener

media.headline: Snitker on loss to Pirates
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Brian Snitker talks about loss to Pirates
media.bigblurb: Braves manager Brian Snitker discusses a tough 5-4 loss to the Pirates after coming back down four and talks Mike Foltynewicz's performance

media.headline: Foltynewicz on tough outing
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Foltynewicz discusses his tough outing
media.bigblurb: Mike Foltynewicz discusses his shaky outing against the Pirates after allowing six hits and three walks in 3 2/3 innings of work in 5-4 loss

media.headline: McCutchen on home opener
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: McCutchen talks about playing in home opener
media.bigblurb: Andrew McCutchen discusses the Pirates' home-opener and playing in front of the home crowd

media.headline: Hurdle talks win over Braves
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Hurdle on Nova's start, Freese's status
media.bigblurb: Pirates manager Clint Hurdle talks about Ivan Nova's game plan on the mound in the win over the Braves and an update on David Freese

media.headline: Recap: ATL 4, PIT 5
media.blurb: 4/7/17: McCutchen's three-hit day leads Pirates
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Andrew McCutchen's three hits and back-to-back homers by David Freese and Francisco Cervelli powered the Bucs to a 5-4 victory

media.headline: 4/7/17 CG: ATL@PIT
media.blurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: ATL@PIT
media.bigblurb: 4/7/17 Condensed Game: ATL@PIT

media.headline: Freese, Harrison on Pirates' win
media.blurb: ATL@PIT: Freese, Harrison on Bucs winning home opener
media.bigblurb: David Freese and Josh Harrison talk about the Pirates topping the Braves 5-4 in the home opener
